Package io.github.eutro.wasm2j.conf.impl

Class ByteBufferMemoryConvention

java.lang.Object
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.ext.ExtHolder
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.ext.DelegatingExtHolder
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.conf.impl.DelegatingExporter
io.github.eutro.wasm2j.conf.impl.ByteBufferMemoryConvention
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstructorCallback, ExportableConvention, MemoryConvention, ExtContainer
public class ByteBufferMemoryConvention extends DelegatingExporter implements MemoryConvention
A MemoryConvention that has a ByteBuffer as its underlying representation.

    • MEMORY_BYTE_BUFFER

      public static final Ext<ValueGetterSetter> MEMORY_BYTE_BUFFER
      An ext that provides access to the underlying byte buffer.

      For use with optimising emitMemCopy(IRBuilder, Effect, MemoryConvention).

  • Method Details

    • emitMemLoad

      public void emitMemLoad(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly *.load instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_LOAD,
      with one argument: the (un-offset) memory address;
      it will assign to one variable: the value loaded from memory.

      Specified by:
      emitMemLoad in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.

    • emitMemStore

      public void emitMemStore(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly *.store instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_STORE,
      with two arguments: the (un-offset) memory address, the value to store;
      it will assign to no variables.

      Specified by:
      emitMemStore in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.

    • emitMemSize

      public void emitMemSize(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly memory.size instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_SIZE,
      with no arguments;
      it will assign to one variable: the retrieved memory size (in pages).

      Specified by:
      emitMemSize in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.
      See Also:
      • Opcodes.PAGE_SIZE

    • emitMemGrow

      public void emitMemGrow(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly memory.grow instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_GROW,
      with one argument: the number of pages to grow by;
      it will assign to one variable: the previous size (in pages), or -1 if resizing failed.

      The default implementation returns -1 and ignores the arguments.

      Specified by:
      emitMemGrow in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.
      See Also:
      • Opcodes.PAGE_SIZE

    • emitMemInit

      public void emitMemInit(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect, Var data)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly memory.init instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_INIT,
      with three arguments: the memory address to start at, the data index to start at, the number of bytes to copy;
      it will assign to no variables.

      Specified by:
      emitMemInit in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.
      data - The ByteBuffer containing the data.

    • emitBoundsCheck

      public void emitBoundsCheck(IRBuilder ib, int mem, Var bound)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code which traps if bound, a memory address, is outside the bounds of this memory.

      Implementations are encouraged to override this if they can compute their size in bytes quicker than just multiplying (the result of) MemoryConvention.emitMemSize(IRBuilder, Effect) by Opcodes.PAGE_SIZE.

      Specified by:
      emitBoundsCheck in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      mem - The index of this memory.
      bound - The bound.

    • emitMemCopy

      public void emitMemCopy(IRBuilder ib, Effect effect, MemoryConvention dst)
      Description copied from interface: MemoryConvention
      Emit code for a WebAssembly memory.copy instruction.

      The effect will have an instruction of type WasmOps.MEM_COPY,
      with three arguments: the destination address to start at, the source address to start at, the number of bytes to copy;
      it will assign to no variables.

      Implementations are strongly encouraged to override the default implementation when they can more efficiently copy within themselves, or to other instances of the same or similar memory conventions.

      For example, a ByteBuffer-based implementation would prefer to use ByteBuffer.put(ByteBuffer), as it is more efficient, and smaller, than the default implementation.

      Exts should be used to find whether implementations are suitably compatible, as they may be obscured by delegating implementations.

      Specified by:
      emitMemCopy in interface MemoryConvention
      Parameters:
      ib - The instruction builder.
      effect - The effect.
      dst - The destination table.
